member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Log4NetAppender.ApplicationInsightsAppender
member.summary: Log4Net Appender that routes all logging output to the Application Insights logging framework.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Log4NetAppender.ApplicationInsightsAppender.InstrumentationKey
member.summary: Get/set The Application Insights instrumentationKey for your application.
member.remarks: This is normally pushed from when Appender is being initialized.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Log4NetAppender.ApplicationInsightsAppender.RequiresLayout
member.summary: The requires a layout. This Appender converts the LoggingEvent it receives into a text string and requires the layout format string to do so.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Log4NetAppender.ApplicationInsightsAppender.ActivateOptions
member.summary: Initializes the Appender and perform instrumentationKey validation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Log4NetAppender.ApplicationInsightsAppender.Append(log4net.Core.LoggingEvent)
member.summary: Append LoggingEvent Application Insights logging framework.
